description: Maintenance of fire sprinkler systems. Canadian Science Centre for Human and Animal Health, JC Wilt Infectious Diseases Research Centre, and Medical Countermeasures facility require licensed trades people for fire sprinkler maintenance.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Fire Sprinkler System Maintenance

### Notice Details

* **Reference Number**: cb-5697-82132972
* **Amendment Number**: 1 (as of June 16, 2023)
* **Solicitation Number**: 1000246239
* **Publication Date**: May 19, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 16, 2023 (14:00:00)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: October 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: September 30, 2025

### Project Details

* **Project Description**: The Canadian Science Centre for Human and Animal Health (CSCHAH), the JC Wilt Infectious Diseases Research Centre (JCWIDRC), and the Medical Countermeasures (MCM) facility require fire sprinkler maintenance services on a scheduled and as-when-needed basis.

### Terms and Conditions
* **Procurement Category**: SRV
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements

The contract is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

### Regions of Opportunity
The project is located in Manitoba.

### Contact Information

For further information, please contact:
Jeremy Mallon
[Email](mailto:jeremy.mallon@hc-sc.gc.ca)
(613) 371-3237

### Documentation

To access the tender documents, please visit the following links:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5697/rfp-1000246239-en.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5697/1000246239---rfp-fr.pdf

Please ensure to review the terms and conditions of the contract thoroughly before submitting your proposal. The deadline for submission is on June 16, 2023, at 14:00:00. We look forward to reviewing your proposal. [1] if you have any further queries. [1] For assistance, please contact the
